thread.title: Abhay Deol, Diana Penty go traditional in 'Happy Bhaag Jayegi'
thread.title_full: Abhay Deol, Diana Penty go traditional in 'Happy Bhaag Jayegi' - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Abhay Deol, Diana Penty go traditional in 'Happy Bhaag Jayegi'
text:
Abhay Deol in a pathani suit and Diana Penty pondering over something in an ethnic attire with sneakers on -- thatâ€™s the first visual impression of a new film titled 'Happy Bhaag Jayegi'.

Abhay Deol and Diana Penty 
Krishika Lulla of Eros Now shared the first look of the film on Twitter on Wednesday.
"Here's the first look of #HappyBhaagJayegi! Abhay Deol and Diana Penty paired together for the first time @ErosNow," Lulla tweeted on Wednesday, along with an image.
In the image, Abhay seems to be be walking around in a rural bylane, while the 'Cocktail' actress looks lost in some thought while wearing a blue and peach ensemble.
A Mudassar Aziz directorial, 'Happy Bhaag Jayegi' is Aanand L. Rai's third production venture with Eros Now after the success of 'Raanjhanaa' and 'Tanu Weds Manu Returns'.
The film is shot in the rural locales of Amritsar.
